article.headline: N. Colorado 66, Sacramento St. 59
article.story: SACRAMENTO, Calif. -- Senior Jabril Banks had 17 points and eight rebounds to help Northern Colorado hold off a late rally by Sacramento State to claim a 66-59 victory on Thursday night. John Pena had 16 points, three assists and three steals for the Northern Colorado Bears (9-13, 5-4 Big Sky), who matched last season's road-win total of two. Loren Leath had 18 points to lead the Sacramento State Hornets (2-20, 1-8 Big Sky). The Hornets led 7-5 early, but an 18-8 run by the Bears gave Northern Colorado its biggest lead at 23-14 with less than 10 minutes to play in the first half. The Bears shot 56 percent (14 of 25) from the floor to take a 35-28 halftime lead. Antonio Flagg's 3-point shot at the 13:06 mark of the second half completed an 18-8 run and gave the Hornets a 46-45 lead. The Bears responded with an 8-0 run, but the Hornets came back to lead 59-58 with 3:41 to play.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
